abstract: John McCarthy, computer scientist who helped design the foundation of Web-based computing and was a top researcher in artificial intelligence, dies at age 84.
snippet: Mr. McCarthy, a computer scientist, helped design the foundation of today’s Web-based computing and was a top researcher in artificial intelligence, a term he coined.
lead_paragraph: Mr. McCarthy, a computer scientist, helped design the foundation of today’s Web-based computing and was a top researcher in artificial intelligence, a term he coined.

headline.main: John McCarthy, 84, Dies; Computer Design Pioneer
headline.print_headline: John McCarthy, 84, Dies; Computer Design Pioneer
headline.seo: John McCarthy, Pioneer in Artificial Intelligence, Dies at 84
